headline: Is Palo Alto Networks Still a Smart Bet After 19% YTD Surge and New Partnerships?
summary: If you're staring at Palo Alto Networks' latest chart, wondering what move to make next, you're not alone. With a five-year share price return of nearly 464%, and a year-to-date rise of 19%, the stock's long-term growth has been hard to ignore. Even in the past week, Palo Alto Networks climbed 4.6%, outpacing many peers and grabbing investor attention. Short-term momentum has caught a ride on the back of upbeat sentiment around cybersecurity demand, as high-profile incidents keep network...
